snippet.title: Beat Slayer | Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Beat 'em to the beat!​ To celebrate Gamescom 2023, we've created a small update with new gameplay and a few more impressions of Beat Slayer. Have fun!

Put on your headphones, feel the beat, step into the flow and survive. Beat Slayer is all about rhythm and fighting. Pick a crazy weapon like the flamethrowing axe and turn hordes of robots into scrap metal by creating your own symphony of destruction.

Wishlist now on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2089830/Beat_Slayer/

ByteRockers' Games on Social Media:
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/byterockers...
► Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/ByteRockers
► Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ByteRockersG...
► Website: https://www.byterockers.games/


#rhythm #indiegame #gamescom #gamescom2023  #roguelike #beatslayer #indiedev #indiedevelopers #action #gameplay #teaser
